title: MT69303: Computational Metallurgy Laboratory - Quick Facts
text:
MT69303
Course name | COMPUTATIONAL METALLURGY LABORATORY
Offered by | Metallurgical & Materials Engineering
Credits | 2
L-T-P | 0-0-3
Previous Year Grade Distribution
{{{grades}}}
Semester | {{{semester}}}

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: 1.Assignments related to basics of C- Programming2.Solution of a set of linear algebraic equations and application to metallurgical reactor design3.Solution of a set of non-linear equations and application to thermodynamic problem4.Solutions of a set of ordinary differential equation and application to chemical kinetics of Metallurgical reactions5.Solution of a transient, one dimensional heat conduction equation with temperature dependent properties related to heat treatment problem6.Solution of multidimensional diffusive partial differential equation related to heat and mass transfer in Metallurgical system7.Solution of one/two dimensional convective diffusive equation for solving simplified liquid system in Metallurgy
